Description: The read interaction of the Organization resource allows you to look up an organization using a constant server ID. The read interaction allows clients to store only the server ID, and with a single request, retrieve the most up-to-date information about an organization. Read interactions typically begin with a client having previously established a relationship, often through querying for Organization or PractitionerRoles through the search interaction.
SampleResponse:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<Organization xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="e8-b6zbd5nij-uy7dKob2wIFgizUvypkqlTL216P7vpY3" />

<extension url="https://open.epic.com/fhir/extensions/specialty">

<valueCodeableConcept>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.10.686980.110" />

<code value="4" />

<display value="Cardiology" />

</coding>

</valueCodeableConcept>

</extension>

<active value="true" />

<name value="SAM Department" />

<telecom>

<system value="phone" />

<value value="9978546312" />

<use value="work" />

</telecom>

<telecom>

<system value="phone" />

<value value="9958642233" />

<use value="work" />

</telecom>

<telecom>

<system value="fax" />

<value value="9996663333" />

<use value="work" />

</telecom>

<address>

<city value="Anchorage" />

<country value="Russia" />

</address>

<partOf>

<reference value="https://vs-icx.epic.com:443/Interconnect-CDE/api/FHIR/STU3/Organization/eFr9POLuS-G.hlY4ovqjtdKFAQOhEpHK3MnPSWHi73TE3" />

<display value="SAM Location" />

</partOf>

</Organization>

active.Name: active
active.Description: Whether the organization's record is in active use.

address.Name: address
address.Description: The address from the place of service or department.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description:
Organization identifier. This element is supported starting in August 2020.

The following organization ID types are supported for organizations in the Netherlands:

ID Type System OID System URL returned in Identifier.system
URA 2.16.528.1.1007.3.3 http://fhir.nl/fhir/NamingSystem/ura
AGB 2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.6.1 http://fhir.nl/fhir/NamingSystem/agb-z
UZOVI 2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.6.4 http://fhir.nl/fhir/NamingSystem/uzovi

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://fhir.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-organization

partOf.Name: partOf
partOf.Description: For a department, the revenue location ID.

telecom.Name: telecom
telecom.Description: The phone number, fax number, and emergency phone number.

type.Name: type
type.Description:
The place of service type. Supported starting in August 2020.

This element supports the following extensible bindings:

  • organizationType: The organization type.
  • departmentSpecialty: The department specialty
